title: Allie's Choice
description: This is an ACE for ASIN:B00H0O7CEG Allie's ChoiceAllie comes home when her grandmother dies to finish the B&B that her grandmother had planned. While working on the house she finds a wooden box and a journal that opens a door to the past which changes her family in ways she could never imagine.Allie's Choice is light hearted fun book! The main character travels back in time to the Revolutionary war and enters into a world of one of her late great ancestors. This short but clever book is a quick read, chocked with quick wit and the simplicity of love. This book will remind you of how important it is to make the choice that is best for your own heart regardless of what others are saying you should do.Comment | by Bonnie
author: Stephanie Albright
